Subjects: prayers, asked on behalf of scribes
_description: Fragment of verse addressed to ‘Cleo’ — two unrhymed lines

HunHM28561.Transcription:
Lladi myn wyche clleped ClleoHelp me nev In thys meserable
                    case

Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.
